name: market for transport, passenger aircraft, medium haul | transport, passenger aircraft, medium haul | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20344/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'transport, passengers, aircraft, medium haul', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of transportation of one passenger across one kilometre (km). This service only considers the transportation of passengers. The vehicle operates with kerosene. Its operation is an average flight of a medium-haul passenger aircraft for distance between 1500 km and 4000 km, based on Zurich airport, Switzerland.  The aircraft has an operating empty weight (OEW) of 52.4 tons and each passenger is accounted for 105 kg. 

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: H:Transportation and storage/51:Air transport/511:Passenger air transport/5110:Passenger air transport
